name: Youth Organisation ALEXIS Prilep
goal:
Our mission is the social and psychological well-being of lifelong learners.

Our work aims to help in the personal and social development of educators, youth workers and students for continuous learning and professional development.
interests: Budget, Education and training, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Taxation, Youth
euInitiatives: We use non-formal learning methods such as self-confidence techniques to strengthen the working capacity of educators and promote access to dialogue as a tool for addressing youth education workshops. Obtaining young people and educators to overcome barriers such as a sedentary lifestyle, supporting the social and educational development, promoting social inclusion and diversity such as creating a way of life-based on health and well-being.
